name: amad the adventure
description:
amad the adventure is a short horror game, where you will watch and play along with a old TV Show

amad the adventure, starring a brave girl named Amanda and a cowardly sheep named Willie. You don't remember any specific episodes or characters in the show. Or what exactly is happening in the show. Or a lot around at all to think about, but it's still strangely familiar. Curiosity takes hold and you decide to watch the tapes to take you back to a simpler era.

Despite all this strangeness In amad the adventure you will have a familiar feeling and want to explore anyway.

amad the adventure Features:
- Pretty unique theme
- The sound effects were spot on
- Completely free for all
- Suspenseful gameplay
- Intuitive controls and easy to use
- Amazing graphics and effects

Enjoy and have fun playing amad the adventure!
